title: What are the reasons behind Yo Yo Honey Singh having so many fans? - Quora

response.answer_text: those fans fall in following categories 1. Below 18 years ( without having any conscience of their own by court rule )2. Under influence of alcohols 3. Less Educated those who don't know the difference between eminem and rap If you count the number of persons falling into each category and remove them from the fan list of yo yo honey singh  Then he will be like a comb without honey  Poor Honey

Before people judge and call me a fool illiterate alcoholic. No doubt the lyrics make no sense. Just admit it people when you want to dance yo yo honey singh is the one. Brown rang , beautiful, haye Gaye Mera dil, achko machko, get up jawani, gabru, angrezi beat, goliyan. These are the Punjabi songs which were super famous before he turned into a sensation and discovered by Bollywood. He got rap genre to India. His music has got beats.simple.
